display.title: Ultimate Smelter
description: At its lowest power (Cupronickel coils and &&7LV&&r Voltage), the &&dMulti Smelter&&r smelts 32 items in just 12 seconds - equivalent to &&926.7 Furnaces&&r, or 3.3 Steam Ovens!
If that wasn't already enough to convince you, standard &&aoverclocks&&r can be applied with sufficient voltage.
And even better - higher tier &&3Coils&&r increase the amount of items it can smelt in &&dparallel&&r!

subtitle.text: Possibly the most powerful furnace you've seen
